# Pablo Goldberg â€” Director

[site]
name: Pablo Goldberg
type: Film director portfolio
location: Buenos Aires, Argentina
languages: Spanish (es), English (en)
focus: Commercials, music videos, documentaries, branded content. Director, director of photography, producer.

[about]
Pablo Goldberg is a film director and cinematographer based in Buenos Aires. Owner of Sun Factory, a film production company in Argentina. Graduated in Visual Arts & Design, Panamerican School of Design & Advertising, 1997. Over 20 years directing and shooting short films, documentaries, commercials, music videos, feature films, television, live events, and advertising photography.

[content]
Canonical URLs (default locale: es):
- Home: https://pablogoldberg.com/es
- Work (projects): https://pablogoldberg.com/es/work
- About: https://pablogoldberg.com/es/about
- Contact: https://pablogoldberg.com/es/contact
English (en): same paths with /en prefix (e.g. https://pablogoldberg.com/en/work).
Project detail: https://pablogoldberg.com/es/work/<slug> (or /en/work/<slug>).

[media]
Video: Vimeo, YouTube (embeds). Images: Supabase Storage (project covers and galleries), local assets in /images.
